review: I really wanted to like this product.  The idea of it is really great but unfortunately it just doesn't work.  If the TV you are putting this on is not very close to your WIFI source you will be very disappointed.  I have a small house and my modem is downstairs.  I wanted to use this on my upstairs bedroom TV so I could watch Netflix and Amazon Prime, etc.  It installed easily but the reception was terrible.  Constant buffering and dropping of signal would occur.  Couldn't even watch one half hour episode of The Office without it stopping dozens of times.  And this bedroom is almost directly above where the modem is on the floor below.  So I cannot recommend this product.  If they can come up with a better receiver on the stick itself, then I will give it a try again.  Otherwise I'll have to try one of the competing products.
